text:
James McAvoy (; born 21 April 1979) is a Scottish actor. He is best known for his roles in movies such as ' (2005), "The Last King of Scotland" (2006), "Becoming Jane" (2007), "Atonement" (2007), "Wanted" (2008) and Professor X in "X-Men" film series.
McAvoy was born in Glasgow, Scotland. He was raised as a Roman Catholic. He married English actress Anne-Marie Duff on 11 November 2006 but they divorced in 2016. They have a son named Brendan, born in 2010.
McAvoy starred as adult Bill Denbrough in the 2019 horror movie "It – Chapter Two".
